thing-type.label: ZSE44 Temperature Humidity Sensor
thing-type.description:
Temperature Humidity Sensor

Overview

Temperature and humidity sensor.


Inclusion Information

Open cover, click Z-Wave button 3 times rapidly.  LED indicator will start blinking.


Exclusion Information

Open cover, click Z-Wave button 3 times rapidly.  LED indicator will start blinking.


Wakeup Information

Open cover, click Z-Wave button rapidly 4 times.  The LED indication will flash twice.

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Battery Reporting Threshold
parameter.description:
Set the threshold for battery reporting

Overview

Sets the percentage change to cause a battery report

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Low Battery
parameter.description:
When the sensor should report low battery

Overview

Sets the low battery threshold by percentage

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Temperature Reporting Threshold
parameter.description:
Sensor will send a new temperature report if difference exceeds this threshold

Overview

Sets change reporting threshold value for temperature in tenths of a degree

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Humidity Reporting Threshold
parameter.description: Sensor will send a new humidity report if difference exceeds this threshold value

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Temperature Alarm High
parameter.description:
Set the temperature level for a heat alert notification to be sent to your hub and devices associated in Group 2.

Overview

Set the temperature level for a high heat alert notification to be sent to your hub and devices associated in Group 2.

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: High Temperature Alarm Reporting
parameter.description:
Decide if and how the sensor should report a heat alert.

Overview

Values: 0 – no notifications sent to the hub or association groups; 1 – notification sent to the hub only; 2 – Basic Set On command sent to devices in Group 2 only; 3 – notification sent to the hub (lifeline) and Basic Set On to the devices associated in Group 2; 4 – Basic Set Off command sent to devices in Group 2 only; 5 – notification sent to the hub and Basic Set Off to the devices associated in Group 2; 6 – Basic Set On and Off commands sent to devices in Group 2 only; 7 – notification sent to the hub and Basic Set On and Off to the devices associated in Group 2 (default).

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Temperature Alarm Low
parameter.description:
Set the temperature level for a freeze / low temperature alert notification to be sent to your hub and devices associated in Group 3.

Overview

Set the temperature level for a freeze / low temperature alert notification to be sent to your hub and devices associated in Group 3.

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: Low Temperature Alarm Reporting
parameter.description:
Decide if and how the sensor should report a low temperature / freeze alert.

Overview

Values: 0 – no notifications sent to the hub or association groups; 1 – notification sent to the hub only; 2 – Basic Set On command sent to devices in Group 3 only; 3 – notification sent to the hub (lifeline) and Basic Set On to the devices associated in Group 3; 4 – Basic Set Off command sent to devices in Group 3 only; 5 – notification sent to the hub and Basic Set Off to the devices associated in Group 3; 6 – Basic Set On and Off commands sent to devices in Group 3 only; 7 – notification sent to the hub and Basic Set On and Off to the devices associated in Group 3 (default).

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: Humidity Alerts High
parameter.description:
Set the humidity level for a high humidity alert notification to be sent to your hub and devices associated in Group 4.

Overview

Values: 0 – disabled (default); 1 – 100 (%).

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: High Humidity Alarm Reporting
parameter.description:
Decide if and how the sensor should report a high humidity alert.

Overview

Values: 0 – no notifications sent to the hub or association groups; 1 – notification sent to the hub only; 2 – Basic Set On command sent to devices in Group 4 only; 3 – notification sent to the hub (lifeline) and Basic Set On to the devices associated in Group 4; 4 – Basic Set Off command sent to devices in Group 4 only; 5 – notification sent to the hub and Basic Set Off to the devices associated in Group 4; 6 – Basic Set On and Off commands sent to devices in Group 4 only; 7 – notification sent to the hub and Basic Set On and Off to the devices associated in Group 4 (default).

parameter.name: config_11_1
parameter.label: 11: Humidity Alerts Low
parameter.description:
Set the humidity level for a low humidity alert notification to be sent to your hub and devices associated in Group 5.

Overview

Values: 0 – disabled (default); 1 – 100 (%).

parameter.name: config_12_1
parameter.label: 12: Low Humidity Alarm Reporting
parameter.description:
Decide if and how the sensor should report a low humidity alert.

Overview

Values: 0 – no notifications sent to the hub or association groups; 1 – notification sent to the hub only; 2 – Basic Set On command sent to devices in Group 5 only; 3 – notification sent to the hub (lifeline) and Basic Set On to the devices associated in Group 5; 4 – Basic Set Off command sent to devices in Group 5 only; 5 – notification sent to the hub and Basic Set Off to the devices associated in Group 5; 6 – Basic Set On and Off commands sent to devices in Group 5 only; 7 – notification sent to the hub and Basic Set On and Off to the devices associated in Group 5 (default).

parameter.name: config_13_1
parameter.label: 13: Temperature Scale
parameter.description:
Celsius/Fahrenheit Selection

Overview

0: Celsius

1: Fahrenheit

parameter.name: config_14_1
parameter.label: 14: Temperature Offset
parameter.description:
Temperature Offset

Overview

0 = -10 degree offset

100 = 0 degree offset

200 = +10 degree offset

parameter.name: config_16_2
parameter.label: 16: Temperature Reporting Interval
parameter.description:
Sensor will report temperature at least as often as this value

Overview

Sets the time in minutes for the minimum temperature reporting interval

0 disables setting

parameter.name: config_17_2
parameter.label: 17: Humidity Reporting Interval
parameter.description:
Sensor will report humidity at least as often as this value

Overview

Sets the minimum time interval for humidity reports in minutes

0 disables this setting
